title: Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson closer than ever after using music, movies and love to fight her breast cancer battle
text:
Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson look closer than ever after using music, movies and love to fight her breast cancer battle Tom was by his wife's side as she underwent a double mastectomy and reconstructive surgery in 2015 Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Tom Hanks and wife Rita Wilson used music, movie nights and their rock solid bond to help deal with her devastating breast cancer diagnosis in 2015. 
The actress underwent a double mastectomy and reconstructive surgery two years ago, and devoted husband Tom was by her side every step of the way. 
She was thankfully declared cancer-free following the procedure, and the couple have since said the ordeal brought them even closer together. Tom looks lovingly at his wife (Photo: WENN.com) They've been married 28 years (Photo: WENN.com) Read More Tom Hanks reveals fears he was going to lose everything - but as long as he had his wife he was happy 
They certainly proved that with their unified display at a cancer research fundraising event in Los Angeles last night, smiling, laughing and looking blissfully happy together. 
Tom and Rita gave their star power to the World Cancer Research Fund, after going through their own battle with the disease and winning. 
“Who knew it would make you even closer?” said Rita. Sharing a private joke on the red carpet (Photo: WENN.com) Rita and Tom are known as one of Hollywood's most rock solid couples (Photo: Getty Images) 
“You never know how your spouse is going to react in a situation like this. I was so amazed, so blown away by the care my husband gave me. It was such a normal, intimate time.” 
She told New York Times that Tom stopped work and stayed by her side, and they spent hours on the sofa watching movies that made them laugh and cry. 
"I'm thankful for every single day," she added to ET Online . 
"No one should go through this alone. That not only goes for the person who is carrying it and in bed for a very long time, but there's also the people who love them." Read More Rita has frequently praised Tom's support during her cancer battle (Photo: WENN) Tom has praised Rita's courage (Photo: Getty) 
Tom, meanwhile, has spoken with pride and love about his wife's courage following her diagnosis. 
“All I can do is bow down before the courage of my wife," he said. 
"She took on not only the crisis, but also the issues of women's cancers in a way that I thought was extremely brave and beautiful. I'm glad we're not in high school, because I wouldn't have the courage to talk to her in the hallway," he told Extra . 
"I'm a lucky man." Rita was diagnosed with cancer in 2015 and underwent a double mastectomy (Photo: Getty) The pair pictured in 1990 Read More Tom Hanks' wife Rita Wilson says cancer diagnosis brought them closer together 
As well as leaning on her supportive and devoted partner, Rita found comfort in music, both listening to other artists and penning her own songs. 
She released an album in March 2016 that includes a track called Crying Crying, which she co-wrote about the period when she had just been diagnosed with cancer but it wasn't public news. At the time she was in rehearsals for a Broadway play. 
"Music is a thing that actually can change your mood no matter what you're doing, whether it's listening to music or being able to write these songs," she told ET Online . 
"It's been an amazing outlet not only when you're feeling sad, but when you're feeling happy too."
